website_summaries.verdict: A large interior fits plenty of toast and up to a 12-inch pizza.
pros: Knobs don't get hot to the touch like some other models
cons: No indicator light to tell when desired temperature is reached

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, if it wasn't a burn hazard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster last December. For a two person household it's the perfect size for most meals. My chief complaint, the top dial heats to the point of burning. The coating has melted and shows signs of burning.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Segreti

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year Life Expectancy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these in the last two of years. The life of this product is only about 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: kaye dee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what people were complaining about... I mean yes the door DOES get hot but hello! it's a heating tool right? I think I'd be disappointed if it didn't right? IT WORKS GREAT! We use our daily since we got it... we've made toast, baked a pie, made biscuits, baked glazed chicken, toasted bagels, roasted veggies and baked potatoes ... we use it for everything and LOVE IT! So happy we tried it for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: cade

customer_reviews.title: This oven is great in every way
customer_reviews.text: This oven is great in every way. It's powerful for such a small unit. Convection baking is VERY powerful...I had to learn to adjust the temperature and time when baking using convection. I burned a lot of things before getting it right. But that was user error, not the oven. It's a good buy and a great addition to any kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Second Oster
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oven to replace an Oster I bought in 1995. I used that one almost every day and did the bulk of my cooking with it as I cook only for myself. So far this new oven has lived up to my expectations and with it's increased size and enhanced features (conventional bake setting), it has exceeded my expectations. I would recommend this oven to anyone who wants a relatively low tech work horse for their cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: iceman47

customer_reviews.title: Temp control is WAY WAY WAY OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I had an oven just like this for years and loved it. It suddenly died after approx 5 years. I got this one as replacement; thinking it was identical. Purchased in 2018. I have tried everyway in the world to figure out what is wrong with the temperature control. It will burn your food if you set it on the recipe-designated temp You can try to just set it lower; but then you don't know how much and how long for the timer. I WOULD LIKE TO RETURN THIS OVEN; IT IS DEFECTIVE and I didn't do anything to ruin it---I am sick of gambling with my casseroles/cakes, pies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Carole B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I use my toaster oven several times a week to cook dinner with. The exterior does get hot so don't touch it. It's not a problem here. The oven cools off very quickly after use. My one complaint is about closing the oven door. After it is opened, and I go to close it, I have grabbed the door instead of the handle several times. It's easy to do and very hot. They could redesign the handle to eliminate the open space causing the door grabs. That's the reason for only four stars. Otherwise, I love my oven.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Nice oven. nice size. Don't lile the stainless steel material. gets dirty, stained for nothing. The broil feature I dont think works properly. We mostly use "toast" to heat food and bake functions. I used broil 2 or 3 times and didn't heat enough. I wish I bought the black finish. this SS is to bright and like I said earlier it gets stained for nothing. Look art the side picture you will see the stains or increase the last phot and you will see how the ss is stained, I clean it with the ecloth for SS and nothing helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power cord too short.
customer_reviews.text: lightweight and useful does what the description says. However the power cord is shorter than the unit is long. It has to be immediately in front of a outlet. You can't plug in to the right of a socket as the cord wont reach the length of the unit. A good product ruined by it's power cord length. Yes this is an explanation in the package explaining why the cord is so short, but that doesn't move my sockets to the right side of my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works well with a few problems. It's hard to see the words on the dials. When turning off the timer it's too easy to accidently turn the dial too far, which turns on the toaster. Baking and broiling are uneven; a pizza ends up darker on one side than on the other. Pre-heating seems to take a very long time -- I guess because the size of the oven is so large. I often don't wait and put a piece of foil over the food to keep it from scorching. The convection oven is great. . .it halves the time it takes to bake things, and quickly defrosts frozen food as long as it's not too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: I love this little oven
customer_reviews.text: I sat this oven on my counter and use it almost daily. It is so easy to use and I don't have to wait 10 minutes for it to warm like my regular oven. Great for making toast or grilling meats and making biscuits. Gets a lot of use at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The finish is NOT as described
customer_reviews.text: We are upgrading our kitchen with stainless steel cooktop and appliances. The finish is important to us. The product description is "brushed chrome," the pictures clearly show a brushed finish, but the actual product shipped is highly polished mirror chrome and it makes the oven stand out like a sore thumb. This product is NOT as advertised and we'll be returning it. It seems a brushed nickel or brushed steel finish is sold through other merchants, but the one received from Amazon is definitely not brushed.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Cant read.. burns fast.
customer_reviews.text: Great oven function, A work horse. My complaint is there is no way the human eye can read the dials. Period. So, with no interior light to gauge the color of what's cooking, one has to either memorize the settings or somehow mark accordingly and I wasn't breaking out the nail polish. Instead I chose the first option but when it wears out I will not purchase this model again. Too much work and worry. And when they say the convection feature cooks in 1/3 less the time , listen, cause they ain't lying.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Rabiller

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous design. I don't use it as a toaster. but it's great for warming pizza and baking small roasts. And it's so pretty. I bake fish in foil comes out womderful. It fits a 1/4 commercial baking pan. I got this nearly two years ago and it has done well. I would like something a bit larger but it seems that the next step up is not dependable.
customer_reviews.author: PINON

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC for apartment living!
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute LIFESAVER in my tiny apartment with no oven. So roomy! So convenient! So amazing!! It cooked all kinds of stuff and was more than enough for me by myself. Could easily handle cooking for 2, I bet. A must-have for a small apartment if you don't have an oven of your own!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I think the manufacturer forgot about the handles on the 13x9 pans, also forgot to continue applying the thermal rubber seal all around the door seat, it is on the right side only. Would be great to have two lights to show which heater is on.
customer_reviews.author: SAH

customer_reviews.title: A well made, high quality item!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the Oster Large Convection Toaster Oven, Brushed Chrome (TSSTTVSK01).. I choose to use the Convection 'Bake 'choice because I like how the food is evenly baked, in shorter time which saves energy....I highly recommend this product and the qualitative operations of this Toaster Oven, also the ease of using it....
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Bostick

customer_reviews.title: It was good, while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this 18 months ago, I expected it to last longer than 18 months! I only made toast! I never even used it for cooking! I went to the Oster web site and read the terrible reviews. If I would have known, I never would have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not the toaster oven for me
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item. Cord so short it barely pulled around the appliance to plug it into an outlet. Bakes too hot. Scorched a quiche baking at 400 deg.f and length of time the recipe called for. Took too long to broil a small steak.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P.

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little oven. I roast veggies in it, cook fish, porkloin, pork chops, chicken, bacon, everything. Super easy to use, warms up in a minute, cooks very evenly. Cleaning it is pretty easy - you don't want to use heavy duty oven cleaner or it will ruin the convection function - so I just use Dawn and a plastic sponge. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lola L. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 yrs.old & stopped working !
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2017. About 10.mos in --timer stopped working. Few weeks ago-- "baking " stopped working so I switched to convection & NOW not working at all ! I bought this thinking a good brand & read positive reviews --soooo disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the name "toaster oven" turn you off! This appliance is a multi-purpose one!
customer_reviews.text: This appliance has so many useful features in addition to being a "toaster oven." That is a misnomer for this appliance! The downside is that its size makes it unwieldy for many kitchens with limited counter space. Even the beach condo couldn't handle it. It truly is as large as my microwave on a shelf in my kitchen. Lacked the proper counter space and sadly had to return this wonderful appliance to Amazon. Check out all its many features, including convention, and if you have the counter space or the space for a cart for this appliance, go ahead and buy one. You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vera B.

customer_reviews.title: never worked correctly and missed return window
customer_reviews.text: this oven was a gift to my mother. It did not moderate/control temperature from the first use. This is the fourth Oster oven of this model I have purchased and two lasted a few years each before the temperature control was lost. This is the first purchased from Amazon and will be the last. One month return window is not sufficient. Very unhappy with Amazon policy,
customer_reviews.author: Lance J.

customer_reviews.title: Took out the light from previous model?!?
customer_reviews.text: I had the same Oster oven that I had to replace. My older model had a light in it, which I loved. I didn't notice that they decided to remove the light, which was a BIG mistake. Oven works good, temp runs a bit high so I always cook my food at least 5 minutes less than the directions states (burnt a few items in the beginning). Other than that, the oven is a great size for bigger items like 9x13 pans & a 12" pizza. Due to not having the light anymore, I probably wouldn't buy this model again unless they add the light back in.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Little

customer_reviews.title: I love this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven. It replaces a smaller Oster that I've had for 10 plus years. I love the time control on this over, something you don't find on many other brands. This is important to protect from over-cooking that could result if I didn't hear the "done" bell. On this model, the oven turns off when that bell indicates cooking time is over. On other brands, the bell is just a kitchen timer. Cooking is even and the size of this over gives me much more capacity so I can avoid using my standard oven, saving electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: BIG toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: This is really big but will not accommodate a 9x13. The temperature is hotter in the back so half way thru I’ll turn the pan around. I think I could have made a better purchase than this, but you never know til you own it.
customer_reviews.author: Klove0906

customer_reviews.title: Totally Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this oven. I over cooked two things in it, then I used my new oven thermometer to see if the temperature was off, and it was. The test at 300 degrees F proved to actually be 365 degrees. I am returning it. I have an Oster blender I love, I was hoping this too would be an excellent product, but it was not.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi J.

customer_reviews.title: Great oven!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this oven, except that the door does not close completely. Seems to work great and I can barely feel any heat escaping. It is a perfect size. It can even cook a 12" pizza. If the door closed completely, I would have given this oven 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Oven
customer_reviews.text: I like this oven. Stylish looking in the kitchen and really gets the job done. It cooks so much faster than the old mini- oven it replaced that I burned the food, but that was my own fault. Now that I'm used to it, things are cooking swimmingly. Arrived on time and in perfect shape. Just what I wanted and needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K.

customer_reviews.title: So handy to have an extra oven
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cooking, not making toast. It takes forever to make toast (takes longer and not as uniform). But I like having an extra oven, basically, that you don't have to preheat. If you're making things that bake at different temps, for holidays and parties. It takes less energy to run than an oven, so if you're making something small, I use this instead of an oven. I will say that the knobs, etc. are not made of metal, but plastic. I was disappointed about that. If you are in a dorm, or some kind of housing without a kitchen, this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: MiaJay

customer_reviews.title: Made from cheap metal
customer_reviews.text: This was received with the rear rubber feet missing causing it to be slightly off level. I'm not even going to complain about the dent in the top of it since this is the second one I've received dented. The first one had several dents and I had to return it. Neither box had any serious damage to it. Almost like it was packaged with the dents in them. But I suspect its due mostly to the ultra thin metal used in their construction. I would like to get the feet for it since I am not going to go thru the hassle of returning it again but I will not order any more products like this on line..
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: the timer control is not working, it does nut turns off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Oster toaster oven TSSTTVSKO1 November 2019, I love this toaster oven, but the timer knob does not turn off, the only way is to unplug it. I called Oster to report the problem but all I get is a recording. What can I do to to have this problem fixed? Is there a part to it that I can order?
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kuczerewicz

customer_reviews.title: Temperature problem
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the oven. Size is perfect for us. The problem is with the temperature. When set at 450 degrees, I only can get 350 degrees. I put two oven thermometers in it to confirm that temperature. I spoke with a local service center and he said there was no way to adjust it. If Oster rep is seeing this, "Is the service guy correct?"
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy it twice
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster oven that I have ever had. I had first bought this one and gave it to someone and bought another that had a bread toaster on top but it always came out unevenly cooked so I went a bought my original back This one fits full pizzas and every thing but sometimes it cooks a little too good. I wish the temperature gages were easier to read or digital but other than that this one is amazing and I’ll buy it again
customer_reviews.author: joseph igunbor

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly dials
customer_reviews.text: This is a stainless steel toaster/convection oven. It is a nice appliance. The only problem is trying to see the dials. The reflection is so bad that it is almost impossible to see as the dials on the stainless steel background. I have tried using a flashlight and magnifying glass. Whoever designed this should have put either brushed steel or black background with larger white number around the dials .I got this one because it is manual as my digital one did not last as long as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene B

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Went for this one to get a good looking stainless toaster oven for our counter top. Happy with the way it looks nad it is plenty functional. The numbers/letters on the front have largely started to fade or wipe off, which is a little frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an additional oven for tempering knives and other things we do in our shop. The temperature was a little off but I cured that by adding a digital temperature controller. As for normal use; it is awesome. Works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the oven and it operates perfectly. My only complaint would be that the controls are difficult to see. Sitting at countertop height and with the glare from the stainless steel, you have to bend down level with the controls to read the settings. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Better than the last oven
customer_reviews.text: My old counter oven door would not close any longer so I bought this to replace it. Only have had it a few weeks - toasts better than the last one, other than that - it works as I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of research and this one was the one
customer_reviews.text: it gave me everything I wanted: the right size (smaller), all stainless steel to match my appliances (vs only the front plate) and simplicity of use, all at a reasonable price. If it lasts it will be a winner
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Its large but doesn't take up a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Its large but doesn't take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: JTW

customer_reviews.title: Love the manual dials and the apperance
customer_reviews.text: Love the manual dials and the apperance. Toasts and heats wonderfully! Yams and Sweed Potatos are the best! Put 'em in the microwave for 2 minutes, then take 'em out and coat with olive or vegetable oil, or butter, wrap 'em in aluminum foil and pop 'em in this convection oven for 30 minutes at 375 degrees F. Never had a sweet potato come out so velvety! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty and shiny, but not without problems.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old model Oster that looks terrible, but still works great, and I like it better than this new one. The main problem with this one is that the outside of it, particularly the part just behind the handle, gets so hot that it is very easy to burn your fingers when grasping the handle to open it. My old Oster stays relatively cool on the outside. Also, this one has a definite hot spot towards the back, and it you don't rotate a pizza midway through cooking, the back half gets very brown while the front part doesn't. It's pretty and shiny, but just not as good as my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy delicious food!
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day! It's economic, small and quick. Very simple to setup and shuts off on a simple timer, which means you can set it and forget it if you must. Easy to clean too! If you're looking a way to save money on electricity by not using a large oven every time you want to heat something up and want more quality in your food than just a microwaved meal, then get this. The convection function cooks relatively fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gjergji

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Got it last Year and it worked well for awhile. We only used it for toasting. After a year, it won’t turn off. We have to unplug it to turn it off so toasts don’t come right. They come out burned.
customer_reviews.author: dracosta2000

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for one person like myself who does not bake large amounts of food. Good alternative to replacing a full sized over. The customer service who I used for another model oven I got last year went beyond any expectations in helping me, Great to know a product is backed up without paying anything extra for warranties. I checked out reviews on all models and makers of countertop ovens and must say this oven is as good as the more expensive brands. .
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: Almost great, the fine black print next to the three knobs is too hard to see for everyone in the family. I thought it was just me an my older eyes, but all my kids are saying they can't see the options. Here comes the Sharpie....
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at needs plenty of air space
customer_reviews.text: I like that the overall appearance is nice. My fault I did not realize this model does not have an interior light which would make it easier to see inside when the door is open. Generates a lot of exterior heat so I have ordered a stainless steel cart so when I bake there will be plenty of air space.
customer_reviews.author: Scubasteve

customer_reviews.title: Size of the oven
customer_reviews.text: I thought the toaster oven would be larger than what it is. We previously had one just like this one but it was larger. Little disappointed in the size, but learning to live with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for seniors who don't want to run the oven to eat.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, won't say easy to use, but better than older units. Must place away from wall socket as it gets Hot. DON'T put or store anything on top or next to it that can melt or burn.
customer_reviews.author: J.G. Emrys, Compounding HerbalistTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oven. If I use my regular oven it heats up my entire apartment. With just my husband and I this is perfection
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Most anything I normally cooked in my regular gas oven can now be cooked in this beauty. It doesn't heat up the whole kitchen the way my gas oven does. Learning cooking temps and times takes a bit of learning. Generally speaking, set temp a bit below recipe recommendations, and cooking time will be 10-20% less when using the convection setting. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: DaBlue

customer_reviews.title: Great countertop oven.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and it works very well. One question: On the door jam, on the control knob side is a strip of rubber that goes from about 2" on top, around the corner and down to the bottom of the inside opening I thought it was a seal except, on the opposite side there is only adhesive. Is something missing or is this how it should be?
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Really big
customer_reviews.text: This unit is huge. It doesn't fit on my counter, so we put it in our motorhome and use it outside on a table. It works fine and is very roomy. I don't like the shiny outside. It is not a true stainless look. Otherwise, its ok.
customer_reviews.author: JudyGG

customer_reviews.title: Super shiny, difficult to read controls
customer_reviews.text: The finish is really shiny chrome and the controls are difficult to read due to very small lettering on ultra shiny background. The product image shown here is not accurate. It functions alright. Runs a little hot as usual with this type of oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Knob stopped working after a year!
customer_reviews.text: The timer knob stopped working after 13 months of use! Just out of the one year warranty period. Extremely disappointed after my previous Oster lasted 5 years, which is why I chose this one to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Jgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Love this little oven. Its big enough to hold a 9x13 pan yet outer dimensions fit my tiny kitchen perfectly. I've baked everything in it and have had great results every time. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, well packaged. It heats fast, has convection cooking, too. I am using it for casseroles as well as warm ups. I am giving it five stars as feel the quality is there, it warms/cooks/heats as well as a full-sized oven. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Toaster oven lasted approx. 1 year! Gets very, very hot and you can easily burn yourself! Will not buy another Oster product. Will go back to Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbogaggins

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes not easy to decide on temperature for baking and toasting. Burnt my stuff so many times. The worst part is that after using it for more than one year, while baking something It's glass door exploded. Thank god no one got hurt. But never had this kind of experience with any of my appliances. Definitely not buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Reens K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this oven. I am still having some trouble finding the right temperatures because they're not matching up with the products I'm cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Tempature is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Toaster oven looks very nice but the tempature is off. I baked chicken and set it on 375 degrees and the oven thermometer finally stopped at 450. I thought this thing got offely hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie K

customer_reviews.title: Oster has been impressing me!
customer_reviews.text: I have only owned for a short while, but it cooks evenly with a decent convection function. I bought this as function test really to see if I would like using a toaster oven for my meals. I didn't plan on keeping this brand for too long with full intentions of upgrading to one of the three hundred dollar models, but I'm really in no rush. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: mpmccowan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good oven but with most Convections
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good oven but with most Convections, if you use it often the oven burns out. The first one I had was a Frigidare and it lasted about six months but I was using the Convections every single time. Then I bought this Oster and it lasted about 16 months and again using the Convection every time. So I guess if you use the Convections sparely it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this toaster oven. It is as cute as can be and works amazingly. Toast is toasted in half the time our old toaster oven did. Haven't tried the convection yet but feel confident we will be just as pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: K.D. Hamel-Brown

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LIKE IT AT ALL. TEMPERATURE IS NOT ACCURATE AND IT  BURNS MY BAKING.
customer_reviews.text: Like it except for the temperature. I set it at 350 and it goes past 450 but have to use it more to see if it levels out as some say. I loved my old one so hope this one lives up to it. DO NOT LIKE IT AT ALL. TEMPERATURE IS NOT ACCURATE AND IT BURNS MY BAKING.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Shiny chrome NOT brushed
customer_reviews.text: The product is NOT AS ADVERTISED. It is not brushed chrome, the front is super shiny chrome, like mirror finish shiny. The online ad, the box and description all day brushed. 😒 That is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: jenna j.

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: The toaster oven came with a big dent in the top on one of the sides. I was very disappointed because our regular oven has been burning soot and we haven’t been able to get it fixed yet. Also our Breville toaster oven stopped working. I knew it was coming yesterday so I got something for dinner that we could cook in it. Needless to say I didn’t want to use it knowing I would be returning it. I hope when the replacement comes I’m not disappointed by the quality of this toaster oven. If I am I return it for a brand with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Huge! Great oven
customer_reviews.text: WOW HUGE! A lot bigger than I thought! Definitely not just your average 6slice toaster oven! It is literally like having a mini oven on your counter! A 13x9 jelly roll pan fits in perfectly side to side and has a lot of room to spare front to back. Loving the convection for sandwiches- super hot and very crisp rolls. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: MAG02920

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This has changed the way I cook. When I have any cooking recipe, if it is for the stovetop, I determine how I can adjust it to cook in this wonderful toaster/convection oven.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: exterior gets HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Works alright but takes long time to toast bread and the exterior gets as hot as the interior so we've been burned by accidentally brushing by it to open the cupboard above it while it's on . Crazy !
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Replaced worthless propane oven in our RV.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at reasonable price. Markings for knobs are hard to see, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to read control settings
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to see and set controls and to read the various function settings positions. Have had to paint controls to easily see and determine setting indicator
customer_reviews.author: spcb

customer_reviews.title: This works great, for toast or a pork roast
customer_reviews.text: This works great, for toast or a pork roast. Highly recommend buying it. It's large capacity makes it easy to cook anything.
customer_reviews.author: Salmonharted

customer_reviews.title: Attractive addition to your home and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little oven, but it runs about 100 degrees hotter than setting. If you know this, set your temp accordingly and you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Warner

customer_reviews.title: New Convection Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my New Convection / Toaster Oven! It's a little larger than my previous one, so I wish I could shrink it about 2 to 3 inches in width and depth so that it would fit better on my counter top, but other than that, it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Oven works great, toasted bread in no time
customer_reviews.text: Oven works great, toasted bread in no time, the only negative is the fact that the oven is chrome colored it makes the numbers along dials hard to read, would have gotten digital model if this was made clearer
customer_reviews.author: Greyhound211

customer_reviews.title: missing rear rubber feet and only came with one oven rack and pan.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the oven in good shape, but missing the two rear rubber feet, 2nd oven rack and integrated broil rack. The description included the following: "Comes with 2 oven racks, durable bake pan, and integrated broil rack" I have written to Oster about the rubber feet and will also be requesting the other advertised parts. Otherwise we are pleased with how the oven works.
customer_reviews.author: Cherlynn

customer_reviews.title: Timer broke less than 6 months after purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oven for my boyfriend as one of his Christmas gifts in 2017 and up until yesterday we were in love with it. The timer is no longer working after less than 6 months of use. It won't stop after the time set runs out and it keeps running which turns the oven back on. The only way to turn if off is by unplugging it. Very disappointing not to mention how dangerous it can be.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca S.

customer_reviews.title: Just about everything about it.it looks. Very nice it does not work the
customer_reviews.text: The on-off switch does not operate corrected. It doesn’t- shut off. When cooking time is done. The temperature does not operate like it should. It register too high on settings and so cooking items have to be watch or they will be burnt. I am very dissapointed with this toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is the ticking noise?
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and functionality! However, when the timer "dings" to indicate completion, the toaster oven keeps heating up! We finally had to unplug it, as the unit remained hot. I will be sending an email to Oster as the appliance is a potential fire hazard!
customer_reviews.author: Maylaine Yep

customer_reviews.title: Better than my oven
customer_reviews.text: This convection oven cooks better than my oven. It gets really hot and cooks things really quickly. There is no need to preheat at all. Just put in whatever you are cooking at the suggested time and temp. and that's it. It does get hot so you need to watch your food to make sure it doesn't burn. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindness

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed. I normally love Oster product but can't say ...
customer_reviews.text: The heating elements on this are so too small to cook anything in a timely manner. It would take the meat in the picture about 3 hours to cook. I'm very disappointed. I normally love Oster product but can't say that about this.
customer_reviews.author: Yomarq

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control way off
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the temperature is way off. Put an oven thermometer on the middle shelve and turned the temp to 350 on bake. Thermometer went over 500 degrees F. Same result on convection.
customer_reviews.author: R. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Even bought a 2nd one for one of my daughters. Removed our Microwave for good!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Smokes every time I use it. Impossible to clean if any greasy food cooked in it. My last oster toaster oven lasted 10+ years. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Walen Motta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Only used this for a couple of weeks but I really like it. As with most appliances there is a learning curve. Temperature is pretty much on spot. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S reed scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Nice oven - great size, but top knob gets VERY hot
customer_reviews.text: Nice oven but the top knob gets extremely hot! Not sure why it gets so hot as the other knobs don't seem to get as hot as the top one. Other than that I love the fact I can bake a 9x13 cake in it and not have to use my big oven.
customer_reviews.author: G-Ma

customer_reviews.title: Timer broke
customer_reviews.text: lasted one and half years . The timer broke and had to plug in and unplug from wall to use. only have one year warranty
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT COOPER

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year the timer mechanism broke, now it doesn'tt shut off when time is up so it burn everything to a crisp. When it worked it was a good oven with large capacity and a good set of functions and easy to use but for it not last even a year is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality appliance at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The convection oven is very simple and straight forward to use and operate and is versatile to set a wide range of settings with only three controls.
customer_reviews.author: JolieM

customer_reviews.title: It does cook really good. My pans that have handles on sides want ...
customer_reviews.text: The knobs are hard to see. It does cook really good. My pans that have handles on sides want fit in it and they would in my old one. It does have more room from back to front so pie pans do fit. I do wish my rectangle pans would fit! Over all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rita F. Meek

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as described and runs like a fine-tuned machine
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as described and runs like a fine-tuned machine. I really like the feel of this, it doesn't feel heavy, but it's not lightweight. Fires up, quickly and heats to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Defective, fire hazard.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this toaster for 6 months and with minimal use the toaster will no longer turn off. It is a huge fire hazard and almost caused a fire at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Ant V

customer_reviews.title: My Oster Toaster Oven.
customer_reviews.text: I have waited a long time to get this item. It is superb. The price was right. It is very spacious and the baking results are excellent. The controls are very easy to use. One of my best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: KHADIJAH HOLLINGSWORTH

customer_reviews.title: Cannot turn it off, have to unplug it.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this toaster oven a 2 rating is because the oven was great until it stopped working correctly after less then a year of use. Very disappointed in that. It will not turn off on it's own, we have to unplug it. Don't want a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Big and useful. I bought this for my mother, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ydelsi S. Santana N

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: My parents had this model for ~10 years. Loved it so much, insisted on same model. Still loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Countertop oven.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Outside gets very hot. Construction appears to be a bit flimsy, but it is holding up well. The convection function works well. No real complaints other than size. Very large, but is what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth P.

customer_reviews.title: Probably would not purchase again !!
customer_reviews.text: Temperature gauge is 50 degrees optimistic and timer is also inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Lew. Lefcourt

product_meta.title: Oster Large Convection Toaster Oven, Brushed Chrome (TSSTTVSK01)
product_meta.description: A great addition to any busy kitchen, the Oster Large Convection Toaster Oven offers the convenience and functionality of an oven in a sleek, compact design that easily fits on top of your counter. This versatile electric oven uses turbo convection baking technology to cook and brown food quickly and evenly, helping ensure optimal results. A range of settings--including Broil, Warm, Toast, Bake, and Convection Bake--make it easy to tailor your cooking to fit your needs. The spacious capacity accommodates larger food items, such as pizzas and casseroles, while the two adjustable racks allow you to fit multiple items simultaneously. A removable crumb tray collects debris to make cleanup easy. And thanks to the 60-minute timer and auto-shutoff functionality, this countertop convection oven helps take the guesswork out of cooking.
feature_bullets: Convection oven offers exceptional cooking versatility in a countertop design
Turbo convection technology provides fast, consistent baking and browning; cooks at 150 to 450 degrees F
Spacious design can accommodate a 12-inch pizza, casseroles, and more
Optimal cooking results with digital Broil, Warm, Toast, Bake, and Convection Bake functions
2 rack positions , durable bake pan, and integrated broil rack.Watts: 1300 W
Outside Dimensions: Width: 19.76", Height: 11.38", Depth: 15.37" hamber dimensions: Width: 13.7", Depth: 13.48", Lower rack to upper heater: 5.31"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars752 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
